AqqabagSEODescription: The AQQAbag is a filtration system that filters clean drinking water for people in need. üíßüö∞üí¶üíô Discover the water filter here.
The AQQAbag is in use in the following locations:
Der AQQAbag verstopft nicht und muss nic: The AQQAbag does not clog and does not need to be maintained, it is light, handy and can be stored indefinitely. This makes the AQQAbag the ideal product to temporarily supply people with clean water - be it in a crisis, for people for whom no permanent solution is yet available or for travellers. The AQQAbag has been successfully tested over several months and its effectiveness confirmed by laboratories.
Die Anwendung ist sehr einfach: Es wird: The application is very simple: water from a lake or river is filtered with a membrane. The special feature of the AQQAbag is the previously unattained quality of the water at very low cost.
